spitl mahathaya."sudu gona" katussa kiyawu ohuge mulma pothaya.inpasu kiyawu "sudu wadda" ,"lakbime sath wasak","wira diwayina" ,weni ethumage poth katussage manadola pinawimata kapawuni.ethumage diyaniya ge "thiththa kopi" nam wu kruthiyada me husmatama kiyawu thawath pothaki.mekala kiyawu thawath pothak pilibandawa hodin mathakayak hitha radunada ehi nama mathakanatha.ehi kathawanam rathnapura lellupitiye ipadunu lamayek karawala wadiyakatapaharagana gana yama ha ehi gewana jiwithaya pilibandawa kathawaki.ma niwaradinam lankawe prathama warna chithrapataya wana ranmuthu duwata padaka wi aththeda ema pothaya.ehi nama "walampuri" wiya yuthuya.kathuwarayage nama mathaka natha.

kesewuwada hadisi nithirithi nomathiwima hethuwen mema kriyawaliyada abhawayata pathwiya. 1995 di saukhya mahamarga saha samaja sewa amathyanshaya wisin 1980 panatha sandaha yam yam sanshodhana yojana karana ladi. ra. no. san. katayuthu paripalanaya kirima sandaha ra. no. san. upadeshana sabhawak pihituwima saha kalamanakarana athuru mandala pathkirima sandaha panath ketumpatha magin idaprastha sapaya di thibini. 1998 panath ketumpatha parlimenthuwe anumatha karana ladi. (1998 anka 8 darana panatha) rajya nowana sanwidhana sandaha lekam karyalayak 1996 wasaredi saukhya mahamarga saha samajasewa amathyanshayehi pihituwana ladi. ra. no. sa. pilibanda lekam karyalaya warthamanayedi rajya aarakshaka amathyanshaya yatathe kriyathmaka we.

boru sakashi dunnoda boruwata diwuruwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- naya gena naya nudunnoda gini polikaruwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- an hata lakhena deya walakwuwoda anun nomaga yawuwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- nisi lesa mahanadam nopuramin dusil chiwitha gatha kaloda pawidiwa pawiidikamhi noyedunoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- allas gaththoda ee papayata anubala dunnoda ge dora gini thabuwoda ee maithri badun nodakinnahuya- gaha kola bhoga wagawan wiinasha kaloda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- washa wisha kawwoda hadi huniyam kaloda eki papayanta anubala dunnoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- hora jawarami karuwoda adhika milata welaheladam kaloda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- boruwen wanchawen chatuwen mathi amathi warun naradetuwan nomaga yawwoda napuru awi aayudha thanuwoda eki papayanta anubala dunnoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya
